snippet: The big business of college sports may change because of a pending lawsuit, which was brought because of video games like EA’s NCAA Football, the newest version of which comes out on Tuesday.
abstract: Chris Suellentrop article notes big business of college sports may change due to pending lawsuit over whether athletes deserve to be paid for use of their likenesses in video games, like newest version of Electronic Art's NCAA Football 14.
lead_paragraph: The big business of college sports may change because of a pending lawsuit, which was brought because of video games like EA’s NCAA Football, the newest version of which comes out on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: New Season of Hard Hits (Maybe in Court)
headline.seo: Even NCAA College Football 14 Is Changing
headline.main: New Season of Hard Hits (Maybe in Court)
